getJobsFile

public java.io.File getJobsFile(java.lang.String jobGroup)
                         throws org.quartz.SchedulerException
Returns the job snapshot file for a job group. If a publication exists with publication ID = job group, the file is obtained from the publication directory. Otherwise, the generic Lenya snapshot file is used.

Parameters:
jobGroup - The job group.
Returns:
A file.
Throws:
org.quartz.SchedulerException - when the publication could not be built.
